nodes.text: A Weequay pirate ship was a type of starship used for transport and operated by Weequay pirates.

Around 21 BBY, a Weequay pirate ship known as the Marauder was used as a gladiatorial fighting arena for droids. It was later used as target practice by Separatist General Grievous and was destroyed.
Another Weequay pirate ship was seen on Zygerria seconds before Jedi Masters Kenobi and Skywalker landed on the planet.
